title: Advanced Wear Task Killer
summary: Simple task killer for AndroidWear smart watches!
description: *Advanced Wear Task Killer* is an easy to use task manager for Android Wear smart watches.It can be used to see and terminate running apps on your wrist.Now also showing system processes: Right-Swipe to show!This app supports both square and round watches.*Please note* Some killed applications might restart themselves immediately after being killed. This is normal, as these apps run as constant services.Working on all current Android Wear devices, like: * Moto 360 * LG G Watch * LG G Watch R * Samsung Gear Live * Sony Smart Watch 3
descriptionHTML:
*Advanced Wear Task Killer* is an easy to use task manager for Android Wear smart watches.

It can be used to see and terminate running apps on your wrist.

Now also showing system processes: Right-Swipe to show!

This app supports both square and round watches.

*Please note*
Some killed applications might restart themselves immediately after being killed. This is normal, as these apps run as constant services.

Working on all current Android Wear devices, like:
* Moto 360
* LG G Watch
* LG G Watch R
* Samsung Gear Live
* Sony Smart Watch 3
comments: Only ever shows itself and android wear There are considerably better solutions out there.
Doesn't Appear to Work Agree, seems to only show itself & Android Wear.  I'd be happy to try it again if this is fixed.   For now, I'll be looking elsewhere (Zenwatch 2)
recentChanges: +NEW+ Now also showing SYSTEM Processes via right-swipe.
Just swipe from right to left to see them!
